content: the free version of this pattern is available on my linked blog this doily has 22 rounds and measures about 11 in diameter pattern is written using u s terminology **materials needed** * size 10 crochet thread- 125-150 yards * 1 75 mm hook * yarn needle * scissors **special stitches** * 2-double_crochet decrease * 3-single_crochet decrease * 2-single_crochet decrease * cluster * picot
